artist_names: Polo G, Stunna 4 Vegas, NLE Choppa, Mike WiLL Made-It

135 contributorsgo stupid lyricsintro polo g
ayy

verse 1 polo g  stunna 4 vegas
hit the strip after school couldnt wait til i got out of class used to stare at the clock and shit

had to tell my lil brother to chill gotta stay in the house come outside he be poppin shit

got the feds on my ass in the hood cause they think im the one who been buyin up glocks and shit
im just focused on music they say my last tape was a classic but i got some hotter shit hotter shit
might be rocking a show or if im not up the stu then im fucking this cash off

in boa im pullin them bands out cash

aint caught no body and aint getting no money cap

hop on the scene and im thuggin
